article.title: Raytheon Receives Nearly $47 Million Navy Award
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Integrated Defense Systems, Sudbury, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $46.8 million modification to a previously awarded contract for the definitization of the production of an AN/SPY-1D(V) transmitter group, MK 99 Mod 8 fire control system and engineering services in support of the DDG 113 Aegis weapons systems ship set.Â The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington Navy Yard, D.C., is the contracting activity.
